About Me

Let me tell you few things.....

BIO

Hey there! Being a technology enthusiast, I love to build applications - starting from an on-paper prototype into something that people truly value with a keen outlook on adapting to the ever-changing technology industry. Professionally, my interests lie in the AWS cloud platform with expertise in serverless development through API's for high-performance functionality of web applications. I started out in software development since 2016 in the web and mobile spaces with experience across multiple domains. I occasionally dabble in big data and machine learning.

jrsworld

android developer

We have seen the process of manual attendance that has been carried out over the years in all colleges. This manual attendance system is not only time consuming but also often results in false attendance marking. It is difficult to maintain paper and pen-based attendance sheets. So, here we have proposed an attendance monitoring system concept which will be implemented as an android application. This Android mobile application which will communicate with the database residing on a remote server. Using Packet Radio Service (GPRS) or Wi-Fi technology, this application can be connected to the database. Our system will be a user-friendly mobile application. This attendance system will be installed on teacherâ€™s smartphone. It intends to produce an interface to the teacher who would require minimal details to input for marking of attending a particular class of students. Apart from that, the application would support robust user authentication and fast transmission of information via the net service. Lecturers will log onto the application and get connected to the server. After logging, they will take attendance using a mobile phone.

sarvodaya

full stack developer

To provide computerized data storage facility. We can search easily any record. The new system requires less time for completion of any work. All the stock of books is update automatically in the new system. The system is user friendly and anyone having computer knowledge can handle it easily. Suitability for computerized data entry. Maintaining stock, Supplier information, Customer information & bill information are easy.
